description: Check reservation availability. Do NOT convert relative dates into calendar dates. Always pass the user's spoken phrase in requested_datetime_text.

requested_datetime_text.description: User phrase for date/time exactly as spoken, e.g. 'tomorrow at 7pm' or 'this Thursday at 6:30'.

desired_start_iso.description: Optional ISO datetime only when user explicitly provided a calendar date.

party_size.description: Total number of guests for the booking.

flexibility_minutes.description: Search window around desired_start in minutes. Defaults to 60 if omitted.
